member.name: T:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController
member.summary: Backup API.
member.name: backup
M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.GetBackupSchedule
member.summary: Returns the backup schedule of the current portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.CreateBackupSchedule(ASC.Data.Backup.ApiModels.BackupScheduleDto)
member.summary: Creates the backup schedule of the current portal with the parameters specified in the request.
member.returns: Boolean value: true if the operation is successful

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.DeleteBackupSchedule
member.summary: Deletes the backup schedule of the current portal.
member.returns: Boolean value: true if the operation is successful

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.StartBackup(ASC.Data.Backup.ApiModels.BackupDto)
member.summary: Starts the backup of the current portal with the parameters specified in the request.
member.returns: Backup progress: completed or not, progress percentage, error, tenant ID, backup progress item (Backup, Restore, Transfer), link

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.GetBackupProgress
member.summary: Returns the progress of the started backup.
member.returns: Backup progress: completed or not, progress percentage, error, tenant ID, backup progress item (Backup, Restore, Transfer), link

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.GetBackupHistory
member.summary: Returns the history of the started backup.

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.DeleteBackup(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes the backup with the ID specified in the request.
member.returns: Boolean value: true if the operation is successful

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.DeleteBackupHistory
member.summary: Deletes the backup history of the current portal.
member.returns: Boolean value: true if the operation is successful

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.StartBackupRestore(ASC.Data.Backup.ApiModels.BackupRestoreDto)
member.summary: Starts the data restoring process of the current portal with the parameters specified in the request.
member.returns: Backup progress: completed or not, progress percentage, error, tenant ID, backup progress item (Backup, Restore, Transfer), link

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.GetRestoreProgress
member.summary: Returns the progress of the started restoring process.
member.returns: Backup progress: completed or not, progress percentage, error, tenant ID, backup progress item (Backup, Restore, Transfer), link

member.name: M:ASC.Data.Backup.Controllers.BackupController.GetTempPath
member.summary: Returns a path to the temporary folder with the stored backup.
member.returns: Path to the temporary folder with the stored backup
